sources.title: A Truckload of Trouble (1949)
sources.description: A cat, a dog and a bird hitch a ride on the rear of a moving van driven by a very tough and easy-to-offend bulldog. When he discover the uninvited hitch-hikers he puts them to work unloading the van, but is quickly made sorry he did. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/a-truckload-of-trouble-1949/

metadata.Plot: A cat, a dog and a bird hitch a ride on the rear of a moving van driven by a very tough and easy-to-offend bulldog. When he discover the uninvited hitch-hikers he puts them to work unloading the van, but is quickly made sorry he did.
metadata.Writer: Connie Rasinski, John Foster, Tom Morrison
